response.overview: The Spirit of EPCOT Center. Released in February of 1983 this film focused on the shared goals and aspirations of all those involved in the design and construction of EPCOT center. The film contains interviews with Disney executives, Imagineers, and project advisors. Why was so much effort invested into EPCOT? This film gave viewers a glimpse into the vision behind the project.
response.title: The Spirit of EPCOT Center
